Sing up

Fireside Grill & Bar

$$ American (Traditional), Sports Bar

Hours

More business info

Katelyn Hoff
Jersey City, NJ
19 friends
94 reviews

Been here twice now. Fireside feels like an upscale Friday's. It's a nice atmosphere between the restaurant end, the bar, and individual tables depending on the types of parties you are having. I've seen baseball teams meet here, groups of guys or girls or couples. It's a nice environment for everyone. The prices really aren't that bad either. Service is fast, especially if you sit at the bar.

The last time I was here, I ordered a balsamic chicken sandwich with arugula lettuce and mozzarella cheese. Delicious! Also have had their waffle sweet potato fries. Crispy and just the right amount of salt. My friend likes their wings. Good grub food with a cold beverage hits the spot. I would return for sure.
